text: Alexander Grigorievich Tikhanovich (; 13 July 1952 â€“ 28 January 2017) was a Belarusian pop singer. He was best known as a member of the band Verasy. He was awarded the Meritorious Artist and People's Artist honours of Belarus. He was born in Minsk, Byelorussian SSR, Soviet Union. Tikhanovich died on 28 January 2017 in Minsk at the age of 64. == References == Category:1952 births Category:2017 deaths Category:Musicians from Minsk Category:Pop singers Category:Soviet singers
title: Alexander Tikhanovich
